title: Hextech Champion Shard not Working
body: I have 1876lp and the champion shards are 1700lp, i go to the store and it will not let me purchase the shard.

replies.body:
This is a known issue that has been happening after the Store outage we experienced last week. We're currently investigating, but a workaround is to launch into the legacy client to make the purchase. You can access this from the login screen at any time:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
But when i try to click the legacy page it just cloes my client and just nothing pops up {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{summoner:3}}
